p: Whole blood PCR was positive for S pneumoniae in cases with a positive x-ray (128 [7·6%] of 1676) at nearly the same prevalence as in controls (255 [5·3%] of 4779; OR 1·2, 95% CI 1·0–1·6); after applying a PCR density threshold (≥2·2 log 10 copies per mL) to enhance differentiation of cases and controls, 26, 27 prevalence was 91 (5·4%) of 1676 cases with a positive chest x-ray versus 144 (3·0%) of 4779 controls (1·6, 1·2–2·1; appendix).
